trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNRADENTERBOWLOFEMBERS_00081_ADALA_1<tab>The lizards claim they will soon bring us before Ifrit for tempering. You're not seriously considering locking horns with the devil now, are you?
TEXT_CMNRADENTERBOWLOFEMBERS_00081_A1_1<tab>Inquire about entry into the Bowl of Embers.
TEXT_CMNRADENTERBOWLOFEMBERS_00081_ADALA_5<tab>They say no one who enters the Bowl of Embers leaves with their minds intact. Why do you think you will fare any better?

TEXT_CMNRADENTERBOWLOFEMBERS_00081_SYSTEM_6<tab>To enter the Bowl of Embers, you must be in a party of four Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 20 or higher. All members must also have made sufficient progress in the quest “Lord of the Inferno.”
TEXT_CMNRADENTERBOWLOFEMBERS_00081_SYSTEM_7<tab>All forays into the Bowl of Embers are limited to 60 minutes (Earth time).
TEXT_CMNRADENTERBOWLOFEMBERS_00081_SYSTEM_8<tab>Members level 23 and higher will be synced to level 22 upon entry.

TEXT_CMNRADENTERBOWLOFEMBERS_00081_SYSTEM_9<tab>All items in a player's loot list will automatically be transferred to that player's inventory upon all other party members leaving the area. Items unable to be obtained will be lost.
TEXT_CMNRADENTERBOWLOFEMBERS_00081_SYSTEM_10<tab>You were unable to enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80304 /var>. Make sure that you and your party meet all the conditions.
TEXT_CMNRADENTERBOWLOFEMBERS_00081_ADALA_20<tab>The lizards claim they will soon bring us before Ifrit for tempering. All of us are as good as dead...
TEXT_CMNRADENTERBOWLOFEMBERS_00081_SYSTEM_20<tab>To enter the Bowl of Embers, you must have made sufficient progress in the quest “Lord of the Inferno.”
